trans-unit.source: Admin tool for running pymap instances.
trans-unit.target: Herramienta de administración para ejecutar instancias de pymap.

trans-unit.source: As a basic example, you can append a message to a like this:
trans-unit.target: Como un ejemplo básico,puedes adjuntar un mensaje a una como esta:

trans-unit.source: Pings the running server and reports its version string.
trans-unit.target: Hace un ping al servidor en ejecución e informa de su versión de cadena.

trans-unit.source: The pymap-admin tool can be used to perform various admin functions against a running pymap server. This is a separate grpc service using grpclib listening on a port, typically 9090.
trans-unit.target: The pymap-admin tool can be used to perform various admin functions against a running pymap server. This is a separate grpc service using grpclib listening on a port, typically 9090.

trans-unit.source: To append a message directly to a mailbox, without using IMAP, use the append admin command. First, check out the help:
